resources.string: Welcome to the Ultimate Quiz Challenge! Here are the rules to get you started:
1. Each quiz consists of five questions covering various topics.
2. Questions will be in multiple-choice format, with only one correct answer per question.
3. Some questions may allow multiple answers. Read each question carefully.
4. Submit your answer by selecting the choice(s) and pressing the "Submit" button.
5. Each correct answer scores points. The total score will be displayed at the end of the quiz.
No penalties are given for incorrect answers, so guess away if you\'re unsure!
7. Your quiz history and scores will be saved, so you can track your progress over time.
Best of luck, and may the quiz be with you!
